verses.t: After{G3326} these things{G5023} Jesus{G3588} shewed{G5319} himself{G1438} again{G3825} to the disciples{G3588} at{G1909} the sea{G3588} of Tiberias{G3588}and{G1161} on this wise{G3779} shewed he{G5319} himself.

There were{G2258} together{G3674} Simon{G4613} Peter{G4074}, and{G2532} Thomas{G2381} called{G3004} Didymus{G1324}, and{G2532} Nathanael{G3482} of{G575} Cana{G2580} in Galilee{G3588}, and{G2532} the{G3588} sons of Zebedee{G3588}, and{G2532} two{G1417} other{G243} of{G1537} his{G846} disciples{G3588}.

Simon{G4613} Peter{G4074} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, I go{G5217} a fishing{G232}. They say{G3004} unto him{G846}, We{G2249} also{G2532} go{G2064} with{G4862} thee{G4671}. They went forth{G1831}, and{G2532} entered{G305} into{G1519} a ship{G3588} immediately{G2117}; and{G2532} that{G1565} night{G3588} they caught{G4084} nothing{G3762}.

But when{G1161} the morning{G4405} was now{G2235} come{G1096}, Jesus{G3588} stood{G2476} on{G1519} the shore{G3588}: but{G3305} the disciples{G3588} knew{G1492} not{G3756} that{G3754} it was{G2076} Jesus{G2424}.
Then{G3767} Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Children{G3813}, have ye{G2192} any{G5100} meat{G4371}? They answered{G611} him{G846}, No{G3756}.

And{G1161} he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Cast{G906} the net{G3588} on{G1519} the right{G1188} side{G3313} of the ship{G3588}, and{G2532} ye shall find{G2147}. They cast{G906} therefore{G3767}, and{G2532} now{G2089} they were{G2480} not{G3756} able{G2480} to draw{G1670} it{G846} for{G575} the multitude{G3588} of fishes{G3588}.

Therefore{G3767} that{G1565} disciple{G3588} whom{G3739} Jesus{G3588} loved{G25} saith{G3004} unto Peter{G3588}, It is{G2076} the Lord{G3588}. Now when{G3767} Simon{G4613} Peter{G4074} heard{G191} that{G3754} it was{G2076} the Lord{G3588}, he girt{G1241} his fisher's coat{G1903} unto him, (for{G1063} he was{G2258} naked{G1131},) and{G2532} did cast{G906} himself{G1438} into{G1519} the sea{G3588}.

And{G1161} the other{G243} disciples{G3101} came in{G2064} a little ship{G3588}; (for{G1063} they were{G2258} not{G3756} far{G3112} from{G575} land{G3588}, but{G235} as it were{G5613} two hundred{G1250} cubits{G4083},) dragging{G4951} the net{G3588} with fishes{G3588}.
As soon{G5613} then{G3767} as they were come{G576} to{G1519} land{G3588}, they saw{G991} a fire of coals{G439} there{G2749}, and{G2532} fish{G3795} laid thereon{G1945}, and{G2532} bread{G740}.
Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Bring{G5342} of{G575} the fish{G3588} which{G3739} ye have{G4084} now{G3568} caught{G4084}.

Simon{G4613} Peter{G4074} went up{G305}, and{G2532} drew{G1670} the net{G3588} to{G1909} land{G3588} full{G3324} of great{G3173} fishes{G2486}, an hundred{G1540} and fifty and three{G4004}: and{G2532} for all there were{G5607} so many{G5118}, yet was{G4977} not{G3756} the net{G3588} broken{G4977}.NOTE! Extra word: "treis"

Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Come{G1205} and dine{G709}. And{G1161}none{G3762} of the disciples{G3588} durst{G5111} ask{G1833} him{G846}, Who{G5101} art{G1488} thou{G4771}? knowing{G1492} that{G3754} it was{G2076} the Lord{G3588}.
Jesus{G3588} then{G3767} cometh{G2064}, and{G2532} taketh{G2983} bread{G3588}, and{G2532} giveth{G1325} them{G846}, and{G2532} fish{G3588} likewise{G3668}.

This{G5124} is now{G2235} the third time{G5154} that Jesus{G3588} shewed himself{G5319} to his{G846} disciples{G3588}, after that he was risen{G1453} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}.UNSURE: I was going to split "matheitais" here to go with the prepositional inference presented by the defintate article in the dative case. However, I have so far used the genitive of possession and so here for the sake of consistency alone do it again.

So{G3767} when{G3753} they had dined{G709}, Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} to Simon{G3588} Peter{G4074}, Simon{G4613}, son of Jonas{G2495}, lovest thou{G25} me{G3165} more than{G4119} these{G5130}? He saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Yea{G3483}, Lord{G2962}; thou{G4771} knowest{G1492} that{G3754} I love{G5368} thee{G4571}. He saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Feed{G1006} my{G3450} lambs{G3588}.NOTE: Extra word: "touton"

He saith{G3004} to him{G846} again{G3825} the second time{G1208}, Simon{G4613}, son of Jonas{G2495}, lovest thou{G25} me{G3165}? He saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Yea{G3483}, Lord{G2962}; thou{G4771} knowest{G1492} that{G3754} I love{G5368} thee{G4571}. He saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Feed{G4165} my{G3450} sheep{G3588}.

He saith{G3004} unto him{G846} the third time{G5154}, Simon{G4613}, son of Jonas{G2495}, lovest thou{G5368} me{G3165}? Peter{G3588} was grieved{G3076} because{G3754} he said{G2036} unto him{G846} the third time{G5154}, Lovest thou{G5368} me{G3165}? And{G2532} he said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Lord{G2962}, thou{G4771} knowest{G1492} all things{G3956}; thou{G4771} knowest{G1097} that{G3754} I love{G5368} thee{G4571}. Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Feed{G1006} my{G3450} sheep{G3588}.

Verily{G281}, verily{G281}, I say{G3004} unto thee{G4671}, When{G3753} thou wast{G2258} young{G3501}, thou girdedst{G2224} thyself{G4572}, and{G2532} walkedst{G4043} whither{G3699} thou wouldest{G2309}: but{G1161} when{G3752} thou shalt be old{G1095}, thou shalt stretch forth{G1614} thy{G4675} hands{G3588}, and{G2532} another{G243} shall gird{G2224} thee{G4571}, and{G2532} carry{G5342} thee whither{G3699} thou wouldest{G2309} not{G3756}.

This{G5124} spake he{G2036}, signifying{G4591} by what{G4169} death{G2288} he should glorify{G1392} God{G3588}. And{G2532} when he had spoken{G2036} this{G5124}, he saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Follow{G190} me{G3427}.

Then{G1161} Peter{G3588}, turning about{G1994}, seeth{G991} the disciple{G3588} whom{G3739} Jesus{G3588} loved{G25} following{G190}; which{G3739} also{G2532} leaned{G377} on{G1909} his{G846} breast{G3588} at{G1722} supper{G3588}, and{G2532} said{G2036}, Lord{G2962}, which{G5101} is{G2076} he that{G3588} betrayeth{G3860} thee{G4571}?
Peter{G3588} seeing{G1492} him{G5126} saith{G3004} to Jesus{G3588}, Lord{G2962}, and{G1161} what{G5101} shall this man{G3778} do?
Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004}unto him{G846}, If{G1437} I will that{G2309} he{G846} tarry{G3306} till{G2193} I come{G2064}, what{G5101} is that to{G4314} thee{G4571}? follow{G190} thou{G4771} me{G3427}.

Then{G3767} went{G1831} this{G3778} saying{G3588} abroad{G1831} among{G1519} the brethren{G3588}, that{G3754} that{G1565} disciple{G3588} should{G599} not{G3756} die{G599}: yet{G2532} Jesus{G3588} said{G2036} not{G3756} unto him{G846}, He shall{G599} not{G3756} die{G599}; but{G235}, If{G1437} I will that{G2309} he{G846} tarry{G3306} till{G2193} I come{G2064}, what{G5101} is that to{G4314} thee{G4571}?

This{G3778} is{G2076} the disciple{G3588} which{G3588} testifieth{G3140} of{G4012} these things{G5130}, and{G2532} wrote{G1125} these things{G5023}: and{G2532} we know{G1492} that{G3754} his{G846} testimony{G3588} is{G2076} true{G227}.

And{G1161} there are{G2076} also{G2532} many{G4183} other things{G243} which{G3745} Jesus{G3588} did{G4160}, the which{G3748}, if{G1437} they should be written{G1125} every{G2596} one{G1520}, I suppose that{G3633} even the world{G3588} itself{G846} could{G5562} not{G3761} contain{G5562} the books{G975} that should be written{G1125}. Amen{G281}.
